items.sentence: Every day is a page in the story of your life.

I have a brother who lives in another country.
I wonder if I could survive in a cold country.
Actually, everything's a lot more complicated.
Why don't we take this path down to the beach?
We're thrilled with the way things turned out.
I've been planning to do this for a long time.
Tom emptied his piggy bank to buy Mary a gift.
I'm not used to working with someone like Tom.
It's important to stay at least one more week.
Tom's French isn't as good as he thinks it is.
I've found a quick and easy way to make money.
We still have something to do before we leave.
How would you suggest we handle the situation?
I don't hate Tom, but I don't like him either.
I met someone yesterday who knows we did that.
Any whole number can be written as a fraction.
Tom didn't seem surprised that Mary showed up.
Why don't we talk about what needs to be done?
Why don't we talk about this when we get home?
Tom really does deserve the salary we pay him.

Tom has lent me a lot of money over the years.
It's a pity that you won't be able to join us.
We took it for granted that Tom would join us.
There will be plenty of time to do that later.
Don't tell anyone that you heard this from me.
Here's a list of things you really need to do.
I want to thank everyone for what you've done.
We're not allowed to tell Tom what's going on.

Tom won't be able to do everything by himself.
